title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.8 - Issuance by clerk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.8 - Issuance by clerk

State Regulations

When the licensing authority of the municipality where
the premises are located has determined that the applicant possesses the
requisite qualifications to receive a license, the licensing authority shall
issue a license to an applicant as an authorized commercial lessor upon payment
by the applicant of a license fee to be determined in accordance with the
schedule contained in section 481 of the Bingo Licensing Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4814.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
